text: Dominique Bentejac (born 6 August 1944) is a French equestrian. He competed at the 1972 Summer Olympics and the 1976 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:French male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of France Category:Equestrians at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Equestrians at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Dominique Bentejac
